data.title: Dallas Arboretum and Botanical Garden
data.meta_description: Since 1984, the Dallas Blooms festival has offered one of the most spectacular floral displays in the world featuring over 500,000 spring-blooming bulbs.
data.text:
Member Mornings

Daily March 10 – November 3*

Take advantage of your membership with an early morning walk. Refresh and enjoy first access to the garden as we prepare for the day. No photography allowed. *Excludes April 8

Historical Tours

Monday-Saturday 10am-4pm

Sunday Noon-4pm

DeGolyer House

Visit the DeGolyer House for a tour of the beautiful, historic home while listening to knowledgeable docents speak about the history of the home and family.

Mommy and Me Mondays

& Tiny Tot Tuesdays

Every Monday and Tuesday

February 26 – April 8

10am-2pm

Lakeside Exhibit Area

Country Critters Petting Zoo returns from 10am to 2pm, offering the chance to interact with your favorite goats, sheep, bunnies, and a pony. Also, enjoy story time (10am & 10:30am) featuring kid-friendly books and stories and crowd favorite Kindermusik (12:15pm) to activate children’s minds through song.

BOGO Wednesdays

February 28 – April 3

9am-5pm

Buy one ticket, get the lowest price ticket free. Parking not included. Excludes March 13

CC Young Senior Living Thursdays

February 29 – April 4

9am-5pm

Seniors 65 and older get in for $1 off general garden admission and receive a 20% discount in the Hoffman Family Gift Store.

What’s in Bloom Walk

Main Garden Entry Plaza

Thursdays February 29 – April 4

1pm

We’ve taken our popular weekly social media post by VP of Gardens Dave Forehand and made it into a weekly walk! Join the Dallas Arboretum Horticulture team each Thursday for a 30-minute walk featuring Dave’s top picks of blooming plants for the week.

Arboretum Walking Club

Main Garden Entry Plaza

Every Wednesday & Saturday

March 9 – April 6

9:30-10:30am

Jeanne’s Pavilion

Weekends | 12–2pm

Sit down and delight in a picnic while you enjoy musical entertainment every Saturday and Sunday! We will have local solo acts including pianist and guitarists playing today’s hits and old favorites.

Dates and times

Martin Rutchik Concert Stage & Lawn

Weekends | 2–4pm

Join us each weekend of Blooms for our favorite local acts. Load up the family, grab a picnic lunch and relax with great lake views every Saturday and Sunday.

Dates and times

Cool Thursdays Concerts Series

Make your 2024 one to remember at the coolest spot in Dallas as we celebrate our 27th season with returning favorites and NEW acts! Don’t miss the most spectacular view of the sunset over White Rock Lake while enjoying bands from all over the country.

Lineup and tickets
